    Field
    Description
    private Coordinates
    CardPlacement.coordinates
    Coordinates of the card relative to the Starter Card [0,0].
    Fields in Unnamed Package with type parameters of type Coordinates
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ArrayList<Coordinates>
    Player.availablePlacements
    An ArrayList containing all the allowed coordinates where the player can place his cards.
    private Map<Coordinates,Resource>
    Model.Objectives.ObjectiveGeometric.cardPattern
    Map containing the required pattern to satisfy the objective.
    The Keys of the map are the coordinates of the pattern and the Values are the Resource/Color of the pattern.

    Description

    CardPlacement.getCoordinates()
    Returns the Coordinates object containing the coordinates of the card.

    CardPlacement(Card card, Coordinates coordinates, boolean isFaceUp, boolean[] cornerVisibility)
